name: Step Lively
summary: You are an expert at avoiding the lumbering footsteps of larger creatures.
description:
You are an expert at avoiding the lumbering footsteps of larger creatures. You Step to another space adjacent to the enemy.Step Lively Leads To...

Dance UnderfootTraitsHalfling: A creature with this trait is a member of the halfling ancestry. These small people are friendly wanderers considered to be lucky. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by halflings. A weapon with this trait is created and used by halflings.
trigger: A Large or larger enemy ends a move action adjacent to you.
